org.qcri.rheem.spark.execution

Class SparkContextReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.util.AbstractReferenceCountable
      • org.qcri.rheem.core.platform.ExecutionResourceTemplate
        • org.qcri.rheem.spark.execution.SparkContextReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionResource, ReferenceCountable

    public class SparkContextReference
extends ExecutionResourceTemplate
    Wraps and manages a JavaSparkContext to avoid steady re-creation.
